abstract: Nearly two months have passed since Microsoft pulled the plug on its bid for Yahoo. It now looks as if the deal has little hope of being resurrected, even with Carl Icahn threatening to oust Yahoo’s board.
lead_paragraph: Nearly two months have passed since Microsoft pulled the plug on its bid for Yahoo. It now looks as if the deal has little hope of being resurrected, even with Carl Icahn threatening to oust Yahoo’s board.

headline.main: Citi Analysts Play Matchmaker For Yahoo
